articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of January 8 Fishery Station of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of January 8 Fishery Station of KPA
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, looked round the construction site of the January 8 Fishery Station of the KPA.
					 Going round the newly built aquatic products freezing facilities of KPA Unit 534 on Jan. 6, he gave officials an instruction to build a fishery station specializing in the supply of fishes to the baby homes, orphanages, orphans' primary and secondary schools and the homes for the aged throughout the country.
					
					 After being briefed on how the project was progressing before a map, he looked round various places to learn in detail about the construction.
					
					 Watching high piles of heavy pre-fab parts and framed structures, he said that the soldier-builders have done a lot of work in a brief span of time, making tremendous efforts despite cold waves. He highly praised them for their feats, adding that this was the fruition of the mental power displayed by them in the spirit of "at a go". 
					
					 "I thought of the service personnel of the KPA who had carried out any task assigned to them, when I was making up my mind to build  a modern fishery station here, and so, I declared I would entrust to them the project to which the party attached importance", he said.
					
					 Noting that it was the firm determination of the party to build the fishery station as a model for the country, he gave precious instructions on completing the project in time.
					
					 He gave officials instructions to select captains and fishermen and prepare them as all-round fishermen in advance so that they may go out for a fishing operation right after the completion of the project.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the soldier-builders would successfully wind up the project as scheduled.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan and head of state of Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim said in the message he was pleased that the friendly relations between the two countries are developing on good terms, sincerely wishing the sultan good health and greater success in his responsible work and the people of Brunei Darussalam steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Brunei Darussalam
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Sunday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Bolkiah, minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries put onto a new high stage would grow stronger in various fields and wished him good health and greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Demands for Dismantlement of "UN Command"
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Demands for Dismantlement of "UN Command"
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate made a speech at a meeting of the Special Committee on the Charter of the United Nations and on the Strengthening of the Role of the Organization on Feb. 18. 
					 He requested the special committee to pay attention to the issue of dismantling the illegal "UN Command" in south Korea and take a practical measure. 
					
					 It stands out as an urgent matter which brooks no further delay to dismantle the "UN Command" in the light of the trust the international community reposes in the UN and in order to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula, he said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to the initiative efforts of the DPRK, a north-south high-level contact took place and good opportunities are being created to put an end to the vicious cycle of confrontation and improve the relations. 
					
					 What stuns the international community in this course is the U.S. attitude toward peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Far from welcoming and encouraging dialogue at a time when delegates from the north and the south were holding a candid dialogue, the U.S. let formations of B-52s fly into the sky above the Korean peninsula. Even now it is mulling staging large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. joint military drills are provocative and aggressive ones in their scale and nature from A to Z. 
					
					 If the U.S. kicks off joint military drills at any cost, failing to respect the hard-won positive changes in the inter-Korean relations, it will be censured by the international community as it will only reveal by itself that it is the very one keeping the Korean nation divided and bringing disasters of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Returns
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Returns
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) led by Kim Tong Son, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, returned home on Sunday after taking part in the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions held in Italy and visiting Russia.

articles.title: "Missile Threat" Comes from US: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Missile Threat" Comes from US: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the commander-in-chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific let loose a spate of vituperation that the DPRK's nukes and missiles are threatening the world, and the U.S. should strengthen cooperation with Japan in the missile defense system (MD) to cope with it. Earlier, dignitaries of the U.S. military blustered that the DPRK's missiles are posing the biggest "threat" in the Asian region, crying out for intensifying the MD to cope with it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is talking about "defense" while vociferating about "threat" from the DPRK. This is aimed to make the non-existent missile "threat" from the DPRK a fait accompli and justify the moves for building the MD designed to dominate the world.
					
					 The missile threat in the Asia-Pacific region is coming from the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. claims that the MD is aimed to prevent the DPRK's missile attack, but this is a poor excuse.
					
					 The U.S. is trying hard to make such a fiction as the non-existent missile "threat" from the DPRK in a bid to justify the moves for arms buildup and the establishment of the MD in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					  The U.S. reckless moves are aggravating the situation of the region and sparking off a new Cold War.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken.  The U.S. is trying to justify its criminal moves while talking about the missile "threat" from the DPRK, but no country will be taken in by this.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its military racket while justifying its acts, it will be isolated and rejected worldwide.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Halt Acts of Slandering DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Halt Acts of Slandering DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- At a recent north-south high-level contact the north and the south reached an agreement on the issue of halting all acts of slandering the other side and published a joint press release.
					 Nevertheless, shortly ago, the south Korean military said that it would push ahead with the psychological warfare targeting the north, claiming "such warfare is different" from the above-said issue.
					
					 Moreover, the south Korean Ministry of Unification is more desperately resorting to the anti-DPRK human rights racket, asserting the issue of the "human rights records in the north" should be dealt with apart from the agreement.
					
					 Meanwhile, the conservative media are vying with each other to desperately kick up anti-DPRK smear campaign, hurting the broad-minded and generous measures taken by the DPRK to mend the north-south relations.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary terms this an improper behavior of pouring cold water to all Koreans desirous of improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The behavior of the south Korean military to continue their "psychological warfare against the north" only brought into bolder relief its ulterior design to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and escalate confrontation with the north.
					
					 The behavior of the Ministry of Unification to escalate its anti-DPRK smear campaign, clamoring for the non-existent "human rights issue" of someone, is also a revelation of such heinous intention.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are continuing words and deeds quite contrary to the agreement adopted at the north-south high-level contact while persisting in incoherent assertions. This can not be construed otherwise than an open declaration that they would escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north by continuing slandering it.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly hope for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, they should make a bold decision to stop at once the acts of slandering the other side, the acts of increasing misunderstanding and distrust and escalating confrontation and enmity.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Grabbing Islets and Distorting History Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Grabbing Islets and Distorting History Slammed
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kangwon Provincial "Assembly" held a meeting in Chunchon on Feb. 20 denouncing Japan for scheming to grab Tok Islets and distorting history, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Japan is resorting to provocations as regards the issue of Tok Islets, the "assembly" said, demanding Japan immediately cancel the plan to stage a ceremony for celebrating the "day of Takeshima (Tok Islets)".
					
					 It also urged Japan to make an apology for its past crimes against mankind including the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and stop at once the acts of visiting the Yasukuni Shrine and distorting history textbooks.

articles.title: Chairman of Hanchongryon Sentenced to Prison Terms
articles.content:
Chairman of Hanchongryon Sentenced to Prison Terms
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court of south Korea sentenced Ryu Son Min, chairman of the 15th-term the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon), to one year and half of prison terms on charges of the violation of the "Security Law", according to Yonhap News of south Korea on Feb. 21.
					 The court inflicted such penalties on him, claiming that he acted as a core representative in "organizations benefiting the enemy".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's famous work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Vladivostok, Maritime Territory of Russia on Feb. 13.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and deals with his life characterized by the noble love for the country and the people.
					
					 It also indicates the important issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by Thai Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by Thai Paper
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- The gist of "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the National Conference of Subworkteam Leaders in the Agricultural Sector, was carried by the Thai paper The Nation on Feb. 9.
					 The letter which was sent to the participants in the conference on Feb. 6, Juche 103 (2014) deals with the great changes made in the socialist rural construction of the country after the publication of the Socialist Rural Theses (Feb. 25, 1964) and indicates the tasks and ways to finally solve the rural question.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various countries posted special write-ups on their websites from February 7 to 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted articles on the feats of Kim Jong Il, illustrated with photos documenting the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and photos of the birthplace of Kim Jong Il at the secret camp in Mt. Paektu and Kimjongilia.
					
					 An article titled "Man believed in the people as in Heaven" said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the people all his life, regarding it as his motto to believe in them as in Heaven. It went on:
					
					 To improve the people's living standard was his greatest desire.
					
					 He passed away in a train due to the accumulated mental and physical strain while giving ceaseless field guidance for the people's happiness with his superhuman energy.
					
					 His image as the benevolent father will always be remembered by the Korean people.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted an article, accompanied with his photo, which said:
					
					 He smashed the moves of imperialists and reactionaries keen on stifling the DPRK while making a fuss over the "end of socialism" and led the struggle for defending socialism to victory.
					
					 After the President passed away unexpectedly, he had carried forward the idea and cause of the President without an inch of deflection.
					
					 A German organization posted an article illustrated with his photo. The article praised him for glorifying the immortal Juche idea as the eternal guiding idea in the era of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Nepali Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Nepali Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader and world elder statesman who dynamically encouraged the progressives in their struggle for realizing the cause of independence.
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said this in a statement issued on February 17 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il grew up in the crucible of the anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea and pursued the great Songun politics.
					
					 The socialist cause faced big difficulties and challenges in the closing period of the last century.
					
					 The imperialists and reactionaries made much fuss over the "end of socialism" with the setback of socialism in the East European countries as a motive. 
					
					 But the DPRK turned into the most powerful socialist state, demonstrating the invincible might, quite contrary to the anticipation of the imperialists. This is the fruition of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was the great statesman who smashed the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK, further cemented the single-minded unity, bolstered up strong defence capability and turned the DPRK into a socialist fortress that no force dares provoke by pursuing his unique Songun politics.
					
					 He is boundlessly revered by not only the Korean people but the world people for his great Songun politics and exploits.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings in Denmark, Finland, Mexico and Thailand between February 9 and 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed on the front walls of the meeting places were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display there were photos documenting the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos showing successes made by the Korean people in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, co-chairman of the Danish preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, said Kim Jong Il was a great revolutionary and elder statesman who devoted his whole life to achieving the prosperity of socialist Korea, reunifying the country independently and peacefully and accomplishing the cause of global independence. He praised Kim Jong Il's ideological and theoretical feats and Songun leadership feats.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said in a speech that Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, was a distinguished statesman who made a great contribution to the Korean revolution and the struggle of the world people for independence.
					
					 All successes made by the Korean people are the fruition of his wise leadership.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great leader, hero of the nation and peerless patriot of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 Socialism of Korea and its future are being firmly guaranteed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Congratulatory messages and letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on February 13 and 14, illustrated with the portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Mongolian paper Odriin Sonin in an article titled "Leader of the people" said that Kim Jong Il passed away in a train while providing field guidance for the country and its people. It went on:
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the DPRK turned into a power any formidable enemy dares not provoke.
					
					 He went to every nook and corner of the country to make its people lead a happy life with nothing to desire more in the world.
					
					 The Guinean paper Horoya edited an article titled "Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il". The article said that he established the system of state structure with the NDC as its pivot and turned the Korean People's Army into a matchless army and the DPRK into an impregnable fortress. Indeed, he performed immortal exploits which will shine long in history, it added.
					
					 The Zimbabwean paper Herald in an article titled "The DPRK celebrating the Day of the Shining Star" noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's career was the one of a legendary great man who performed exploits unprecedented in history and worked epoch-making miracles.
					
					 He provided the firm foundation for building an economic power through his energetic leadership going beyond human imagination.
					
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise in an article titled "Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea" praised him for developing the WPK into a mother party serving the people and an invincible party enjoying their absolute support and trust.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Serbia, Germany, Ukraine, Nigeria and Ethiopia between Feb. 10 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Films shown included Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great teacher of the world revolutionary people.
					
					 He dedicated his whole life to the happiness of the Korean people and the building of a thriving nation and turned the DPRK into a country of single-minded unity and a military power with nuclear deterrence.
					
					 He, a great patriot, brought about a radical turn in the movement for Korea's reunification and made a great contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Germany and other figures praised Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership feats, saying his greatest feat is that he firmly defended socialism and provided a sure guarantee for the DPRK to emerge ever-victorious by pursuing his Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il for developing the Korean People's Army into the army strong in idea and faith and the invincible combat ranks through his ceaseless inspection to KPA units.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Marshal Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Serbia, Germany and Ukraine.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Different Countries to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Different Countries to Mark Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Sweden, Italy, Thailand, Mexico and DR Congo between Feb. 7 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the seminars were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Communist Party in Sweden, Communist Party of Sweden, Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Italian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, Communist Youth Front of Italy, Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Rome Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Idea of Italy, Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo, Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of DR Congo and the Working Citizen's Association of DR Congo and masses.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a distinguished thinker and theoretician who developed and enriched the Juche idea into the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 At a time when the Korean people faced ordeals unprecedented in history due to the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and severe natural disasters, he defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and laid a solid foundation for the building of a thriving nation with his Songun politics, strikingly demonstrating the validity and vitality of socialism.
					
					 The national coordinator of the Communist Youth Front of Italy noted that Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to achieving the prosperity of the country and bringing about happiness of its people all his life, adding:
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 We will stage more active solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people vigorously advancing along the road of socialism while smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman and secretary general of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership feats serve as a precious heritage for accomplishing the human cause of independence, adding he will always live in the hearts of progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero de EPC
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el campo de construccion de la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del EPC.
					El pasado 6 de enero, cuando recorria la instalacion refrigeradora de productos maritimos construida por la unidad 534 del EPC, el Mariscal dio la orden de construir ahi una empresa pesquera que suministra especializadamente pescados a los hospicios, orfanatos, escuelas primarias y secundarias de huerfanos y asilos de ancianos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo escucho la explicacion ante el mapa alusivo al proceso de la obra y dio recorrido por varios puntos enterandose en detalles del estado de construccion.
					
					Mirando las pesadas piezas prefabricadas acumuladas en monton y los edificios cuyas armazones fueron levantadas evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores militares diciendo que hayan hecho en un corto plazo de tiempo muchas cosas y que esto es fruto del espiritu "De un tiron".
					
					Cuando decidia la construccion de esta empresa pesquera, me vino a la mente el EPC que hace todo lo encargado, apunto y agrego que por eso declaro ante el mundo que pondria en manos del EPC la construccion del objeto a que da importancia el Partido.
					
					Destaco que la firme decision del partido es construir la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del EPC como modelo de todo el pais y dio indicaciones preciosas que se presentan para terminar cualitativamente hasta la fecha senalada la obra.
					
					Indico que deben hacer bien la labor de contratacion de capitanes y pescadores y de formacion de estos como pescadores omnipotentes para que la empresa entrara de inmediato en pesca al concluir la obra.
					
					El Mariscal manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores militares la terminaran magnificamente a la fecha fijada.
					
					Le acompanaron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Han Kwang Sang y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre empresas importantes de Hamhung
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre empresas importantes de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 23 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, investigo en el terreno los Complejos de Fertilizantes de Hungnam, de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					El premier averiguo el estado de produccion de abono Juche y vinalon Juche en las empresas y organizo las reuniones de consulta en las cuales se subrayo el asunto de normalizarla y fueron tomadas las medidas para aumentar la produccion mediante la estricta administracion de equipos y de tecnologia y para hacer que las unidades relacionadas suministren con satisfaccion las materias primas y materiales.
					
					Por otra parte, Pak averiguo el estado de produccion de la Fabrica de Ceramicas de Hungsang.
					
					Tras recorrer los procesos de produccion de la fabrica, Pak enfatizo la importancia de producir de manera satisfactoria los ladrillos necesarios a la construccion de base ganadera de la zona de Sepho.
					
					Con anterioridad, el hizo recorrido por la Fabrica de Materiales de Construccion Taedonggang.
